attributes.additional_details: Having read through the list of e-petitions, i petition the government to have somebody, well anybody look through and delete the ridiculous ones such as: - free fishing, save city airport, ban bright car lights, stop lorries overtaking on the motorway and abolish Islam etc (the list goes on - have a look). If the government don't do this, at least the rest of us can have a laugh, like all MP's are doing everyday of the week as they check their bank statements.
